table.Description: You abandoned your kin after learning a troubling truth
You are guided by a vision or prophesy
You are haunted by past actions or failures
You are running from a criminal past
You are the sole survivor of an attack or calamity
You escaped an abusive or unjust situation
You have no memory of your former life
You rejected a duty or destiny
You were cast out of your former home
You were on your own for as long as you can remember
You were taken or lured away by someone
Your ambitions outgrew your humble origins
Your wanderlust carried you far away
Acquired in trade for a precious family heirloom
Discovered as a derelict, and patched back together
Earned in exchange for a promise or vow
Granted by an organization or community
Inherited from a relative or mentor
Purchased at a suspiciously cheap price
Stolen from a notorious crime boss or criminal organization
Taken while fleeing an attack or disaster
Bridge is filled with buttons, toggles, and gauges, many of which don't seem to do anything
Domed window on the bridge offers a dizzying view
Engine room is scorched with old burn marks
Exterior is marred by rust and grime
Faint, phantom music sometimes echoes through the ship
Hull rattles and groans at FTL speeds
Interior spaces are crowded with exposed cables and conduits
Large wings extend for atmospheric flight
Looks defenseless, but exterior panels open to reveal weapons
Navigation logs contain coordinates to locations that do not—or should not—exist
Old bloodstain in the airlock reappears even when painted over
Patched hull covers a recent catastrophic breach
Placards and control labels are in an uncommon language
Segmented landing gear unfold like spider legs
Someone marked the hull with graffiti during a recent layover
Someone scrawled strange symbols on the deck and bulkheads in the main corridor
Things tend to go missing for no logical reason
Thrusters rotate for takeoff and landing
Timers and clocks are always just a bit off
Blockade prevents trade with other sectors
Bounty hunters search for an infamous fugitive
Chaotic breaches in spacetime spread like wildfire
Devastating superweapon has fallen into the wrong hands
Newly found resource lures greedy fortune hunters to the sector
Notorious pirate clan preys on starships
Parasitic lifeforms spread like a plague
Precursor sites throughout the sector emit strange signals
Prophecies foretell an imminent awakening of a dreadful power
Raider clan emerges as a dominant threat under a new leader
Rogue AI infiltrates systems throughout the sector
Settlements or factions are on the brink of war
Sickness spreads among ships and settlements
Titanic spacebound lifeform stalks the spaceways
Aid a starship caught in the pull of a star's gravity
Broker peace between two feuding settlements
Chart a new passage between isolated settlements
Defend the people of a beleaguered settlement against raiders
Discover who sabotaged a settlement's air processors
Escort a tradeship carrying a prized cargo
Ferry a rescue team to a perilous disaster site
Infiltrate a fortified base to steal crucial data
Investigate terrifying manifestations at a remote settlement
Liberate prisoners at a cruel labor camp
Locate a downed spacer on an uninhabited planet
Protect a fugitive from a relentless bounty hunter
Recover a cherished pre-exodus artifact from an enemy
Rescue a starship crew held captive by mutineers
Retrieve a cache of stolen weapons from a pirate ship
Search for a missing expedition in the depths of a precursor site
Shield a wonderous lifeform from those who seek to destroy it
Track and slay a marauding beast
Transport a displaced people to their new home
Young star incubating in a molecular cloud
White dwarf shining with spectral light
Corrupted star radiating with unnatural light
Neutron star surrounded by intense magnetic fields
Two stars in close orbit connected by fiery tendrils of energy
Black hole allows nothing to escape—not even light
Hypergiant star generating turbulent solar winds
Artificial star constructed by a long-dead civilization
Unstable star showing signs of impending supernova
Advanced technology waiting to be harnessed or salvaged
Artificial consciousness evolved to a higher state
Clues to a crucial resource or uncharted domain
Envoy from another time or reality
Gateway to another time or alternate reality
Key to unlocking a language or method of communication
Monumental architecture or artistry of an ancient civilization
Mysterious device or artifact of potential value
New understanding of an enduring mystery
Pathway or means of travel to a distant location
Person or lifeform with phenomenal abilities
Visions or prophesies of the future
Horde of insatiable hunger or fury
Messenger or signal with a dire warning
Passage to a grim alternate reality
Powerful distortions of time or space
Vault of dread technology or power
Worshipers of great and malevolent powers
A trusted individual or community acts against you
An individual or community you care about is exposed to danger
You encounter signs of a looming threat or complication
You create an opportunity for an enemy
You face the consequences of an earlier choice
A surprising development complicates your quest
You are separated from something or someone
Your action causes collateral damage or has an unintended effect
Something of value is lost or destroyed
The environment or terrain introduces a new hazard
A friend, companion, or ally is in harm's way (or you are, if alone)
You are delayed or put at a disadvantage
It's worse than you thought: You or an ally make a suffer move (-2)
The victory is short-lived: A new complication or foe is revealed
You face collateral damage: Something is lost, damaged, or broken
Others pay the price: Someone else suffers the cost
Others won't forget: You are marked for vengeance
It gets complicated: The true nature of a foe or objective is revealed
You are dying. Within an hour or two, you must __Heal__ and raise your health above 0, or __Face Death__.
You are unconscious and out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to ongoing harm, __Face Death__.
You are reeling and fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move).
You give in to fear or compulsion, and act against your better instincts.
Immediate catastrophic destruction. All aboard must __Endure Harm__ or __Face Death__, as appropriate.
Destruction is imminent and unavoidable. If you do not have the means or intention to get clear, __Endure Harm__ or __Face Death__, as appropriate.
Destruction is imminent, but can be averted if you __Repair__ your vehicle and raise its integrity above 0. If you fail, *destruction is imminent and unavoidable.*
You cannot __Repair__ this vehicle until you __Resupply__ and obtain a crucial replacement part. If you roll this result again prior to that, *destruction is imminent and unavoidable.*
The vehicle is crippled or out of your control. To get it back in action, you must __Repair__ and raise its integrity above 0.
It's a rough ride. All aboard suffer must make the __Endure Harm__, __Endure Stress__, or __Companion Takes a Hit__ move, suffering a serious (-2) cost.
You've lost fuel, energy, or cargo. __Sacrifice Resources (-2)__.
Against all odds, the vehicle holds together.
A pitiless planet of searing heat, blowing sand, and sunbaked rock.
A planet with relentless volcanic activity, wreathed in fire and ash.
A once-thriving world—now a grim monument to a fallen civilization.
A rugged, frozen world—locked in an unending winter.
A massive planet with vast layers of dense gasses surrounding a small rocky core.
A humid, rain-soaked planet which keeps its secrets under a thick canopy of vegetation.
A planet completely or mostly covered by a boundless ocean.
A rugged planet scarred by eons of destructive asteroid impacts.
A foul planet wracked by a poisonous climate and virulent growths.
This diverse, life-bearing planet might provide some small measure of hope.
